### PR Checklist

<!-- Please check that your PR meets the following criteria. -->

List items...
* [ ] are about guidance in research, with likely long-term relevance.
* [ ] have a (hyperlinked) title and description, separated by a dash (`-`).
* [ ] descriptions are concise, informative, start with an uppercase character, and end with a period.
* [ ] are sorted alphabetically (ascending by title) within each sublist.
